text: @mspoint1106 Was first and only flu I had after 40 years. It was rough, but Tamiflu kept it brief and from my husband contracting it. Coronavirus is a-whole-nother level of infectious and harmful. Obama WH response was swift and effective. Trump WH response is utter omnishambles.
